ygData.subject: How Can I Raise 2H Slashing?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a level 11 dark elf shadowknight, and while I love the 1H mino axe/shield combo, I m also interested in using 2H weapons, especially if the Dark Reaver
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a level 11 dark elf shadowknight, and while I love the 1H mino
axe/shield combo, I'm also interested in using 2H weapons, especially if the
Dark Reaver turns out to be a 2H weapons. Howver I've picked up a 2H sword
and only managed to raise the skill to 5, now it won't move at all (and
has't been for quite some time). Do I need to fight monsters that con blue
or something like that? Those of you who have successfully raised 2H please
let me know how you've done it, although I suppose I'll always favor 1H
since I'l need a shield to bash as a dark elf.
